with the approach of Valentines Day weekend couples throughout Eugene will begin the annual struggle to come up with new ways to express their love PERIOD While lastminute roses might be enough few gestures match a weekend getaway for romantic potential PERIOD Just try to skip the truck stop motel and head somewhere a bit more interesting PERIOD

In southern Oregon amorous

opportunities abound PERIOD

Out n About Treesort Cave Junction

Perhaps its the large wooden pirate ship in the front yard but visitors cant ignore the sense of playfulness at this village in the sky PERIOD For  years the owners of this alternative bed and breakfast have invited guests to stay in their  tree houses each built with unique character PERIOD Theres the Forestree a oneroom hideaway lofted  feet in the air accessible only by crossing a rope bridge PERIOD The cozy Treeloon is modeled after an old west saloon and comes with a queensized bed while the impressive Treeroom Schoolhouse Suite has stainedglass doors and an antique clawfoot bathtub  ideal for a latenight soak PERIOD According to www.treehouses.com romantic interludes are the Treesorts

offseason specialtree. it brings back the inner child says Melody ODonnell the selfdescribed Breakfast Fairy of Out n About PERIOD When people first arrive their necks are crooked back and theyve all got smiles on their faces. winter rates range from  to  per night and reservations can be made by calling the Treesort at   PERIOD Occupancy includes bedding towels and breakfast PERIOD

Umpqua Lighthouse yurts Winchester Bay

For a more grounded and economical approach to the weekend try renting a yurt at the Umpqua Lighthouse State Park PERIOD Yurts are durable circular structures made of wood and canvas that are designed to minimize

impact on the surroundings PERIOD

Its a cross between a tepee a log cabin and a tent said Jon Bilenki who recently spent a weekend in one of the parks deluxe yurts with his girlfriend and their 3monthold daughter PERIOD Its luxury in a campground like Ive never seen before. the yurt included an indoor bathroom with shower a television with VCR a refrigerator and a propane grill on the front porch PERIOD

The best thing is you dont have to pack up the tent in the morning said Lee Adams a ranger at the park PERIOD Adams strongly suggests that campers looking to spend a night in one of the parks six deluxe yurts make reservations in advance PERIOD

Theyve become really popular around Valentines Day he said PERIOD

The deluxe yurts are available for  per night through April  and are exclusive to Umpqua Lighthouse State Park PERIOD For an experience with fewer amenities try renting a rustic yurt available at  campgrounds on the Oregon Coast for  to  per night PERIOD To make a reservation call   PERIOD
